text.p: Write a piece of Python code that, given the integer variable, N, prints hello world N times. Each printing of hello world should be on a separate line. You must use a loop, but it's up to you whether you use a for loop or a while loop.
For problems such as these, do not include input statements or define variables we said you are given. Our graders will provide values for you, so write your code assuming they are already defined.

codeparam.answer_display: for i in range(N): print('hello world')
